verses.verse: "You are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> you shall not <S%H1413>cut<s%> yourselves <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7760>shave<s%> <S%H7144><s%> your <S%H996>forehead<s%> <S%H5869><s%> for the sake of the <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

"For you are a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> you to be a <S%H5971>people<s%> for His own <S%H5459>possession<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H8441>detestable<s%> <S%H8441>thing.<s%>
<S%H2088>"These<s%> are the <S%H929>animals<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you may <S%H398>eat:<s%> the <S%H7794>ox,<s%> the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> <S%H7716><s%> the <S%H5795>goat,<s%>

the <S%H354>deer,<s%> the <S%H6643>gazelle,<s%> the <S%H3180>roebuck,<s%> the <S%H689>wild<s%> <S%H689>goat,<s%> the <S%H1788>ibex,<s%> the <S%H8377>antelope<s%> and the <S%H2169>mountain<s%> <S%H2169>sheep.<s%>

"And <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H929>animal<s%> that <S%H6536>divides<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%> and <S%H8156>has<s%> the <S%H8157>hoof<s%> <S%H8156>split<s%> in <S%H8147>two<s%> [and] <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> among the <S%H929>animals,<s%> that you may <S%H398>eat.<s%>

<S%H389>"Nevertheless,<s%> you are not to <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> those which <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> or <S%H4480>among<s%> those that <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%> in <S%H8156>two:<s%> the <S%H1581>camel<s%> and the <S%H768>rabbit<s%> and the rock-badger, for though they <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> they do not <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof;<s%> they are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> for you.

"And the <S%H2386>pig,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it <S%H6536>divides<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%> but [does] not [chew] the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> for you. You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> their <S%H5038>carcasses.<s%>
<S%H2088>"These<s%> you may <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that are in <S%H4325>water:<s%> <S%H3605>anything<s%> that has <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> you may <S%H398>eat,<s%>
but <S%H3605>anything<s%> that does not <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat;<s%> it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> for you.
"You may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H6833>bird.<s%>
"But <S%H2088>these<s%> are the ones <S%H834>which<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat:<s%> the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> and the <S%H6538>vulture<s%> and the <S%H5822>buzzard,<s%>
and the red <S%H1676>kite,<s%> the <S%H344>falcon,<s%> and the <S%H1676>kite<s%> in their <S%H4327>kinds,<s%>
and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6158>raven<s%> in its <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
and the <S%H3284>ostrich,<s%> the <S%H8464>owl,<s%> the <S%H7828>sea<s%> <S%H7828>gull,<s%> and the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> in their <S%H4327>kinds,<s%>
the <S%H9205>little<s%> <S%H9205>owl,<s%> the <S%H3244>great<s%> <S%H3244>owl,<s%> the <S%H8580>white<s%> <S%H8580>owl,<s%>
the <S%H6893>pelican,<s%> the <S%H7360>carrion<s%> <S%H7360>vulture,<s%> the <S%H7994>cormorant,<s%>
the <S%H2624>stork,<s%> and the <S%H601>heron<s%> in their <S%H4327>kinds,<s%> and the <S%H1744>hoopoe<s%> and the <S%H5847>bat.<s%>
"And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8318>teeming<s%> <S%H8318>life<s%> with <S%H5775>wings<s%> are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you; they shall not be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
"You may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H5775>bird.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>anything<s%> <S%H5038>which<s%> <S%H5038>dies<s%> [of itself.] You may <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the <S%H1616>alien<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is in your <S%H8179>town,<s%> so that he may <S%H398>eat<s%> it, <S%H176>or<s%> you may <S%H4376>sell<s%> it to a <S%H5237>foreigner,<s%> for you are a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> You shall not <S%H1310>boil<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> in its mother's <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6237>surely<s%> <S%H6237>tithe<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8393>produce<s%> from <S%H2233>what<s%> you <S%H2233>sow,<s%> which <S%H3318>comes<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H8141>every<s%> <S%H8141>year.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> at the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> He <S%H977>chooses<s%> to <S%H7931>establish<s%> His <S%H8034>name,<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of your <S%H1715>grain,<s%> your <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine,<s%> your <S%H3323>oil,<s%> and the first-born of your <S%H1241>herd<s%> and your <S%H6629>flock,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that you may <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3605>always.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

"And <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H1870>distance<s%> is so <S%H7235>great<s%> for you that you are not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>bring<s%> [the tithe,] <S%H3588>since<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H977>chooses<s%> to <S%H7760>set<s%> His <S%H8034>name<s%> is too <S%H7368>far<s%> away from you <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blesses<s%> you,

then you shall <S%H5414>exchange<s%> [it] for <S%H3701>money,<s%> and <S%H6696>bind<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H977>chooses.<s%>

"And you may <S%H5414>spend<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> for <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> your <S%H5315>heart<s%> <S%H183>desires,<s%> for <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> or <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> or <S%H3196>wine,<s%> or <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H7941>drink,<s%> or <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> your <S%H5315>heart<s%> <S%H7592>desires;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> you and your <S%H1004>household.<s%>

"Also you shall not <S%H5800>neglect<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is in your <S%H8179>town,<s%> for he <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>portion<s%> or <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> you.

"At the <S%H7097>end<s%> of every <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> you shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of your <S%H8393>produce<s%> in that <S%H8141>year,<s%> and shall <S%H5117>deposit<s%> [it] in your <S%H8179>town.<s%>

"And the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>portion<s%> or <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> you, and the <S%H1616>alien,<s%> the <S%H3490>orphan<s%> and the <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in your <S%H8179>town,<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H6213>do.<s%>
